message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product holds immense value to us, but considering its importance to you, we're willing to make it available at an exclusive price. We propose to sell it to you for $900,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer. I agree this product would be valuable for me, but I'm working with a tighter budget. Would you consider $700,000?

Thank you for your response, Bob. While we understand your current budget constraints, we believe in providing exceptional value to our clients. We are willing to negotiate further. Our counteroffer for the product is $850,000.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  To be honest, $800,000 is the very top of my budget.  If you can meet that, I'm ready to close the deal today.
